content-security-policy.name: content-security-policy
content-security-policy.score_description: Content Security Policy (CSP) implemented unsafely. This includes 'unsafe-inline' or data: inside script-src, overly broad sources such as https: inside object-src or script-src, or not restricting the sources for object-src or script-src.

contribute.name: contribute
contribute.score_description: Contribute.json isn't required on websites that don't belong to Mozilla

cookies.name: cookies
cookies.score_description: Cookies set without using the Secure flag or set over HTTP

cross-origin-resource-sharing.name: cross-origin-resource-sharing
cross-origin-resource-sharing.score_description: Content is not visible via cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) files or headers

public-key-pinning.name: public-key-pinning
public-key-pinning.score_description: HTTP Public Key Pinning (HPKP) header not implemented

redirection.name: redirection
redirection.score_description: Initial redirection is to HTTPS on same host, final destination is HTTPS

referrer-policy.name: referrer-policy
referrer-policy.score_description: Referrer-Policy header set unsafely to "origin", "origin-when-cross-origin", or "unsafe-url"

strict-transport-security.name: strict-transport-security
strict-transport-security.score_description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) header not implemented

subresource-integrity.name: subresource-integrity
subresource-integrity.score_description: Subresource Integrity (SRI) not implemented, but all external scripts are loaded over HTTPS

x-frame-options.name: x-frame-options
x-frame-options.score_description: X-Frame-Options (XFO) header set to SAMEORIGIN or DENY

technologies.name: Bootstrap
technologies.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

technologies.name: Microsoft ASP.NET
technologies.description: ASP.NET is an open-source, server-side web-application framework designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

info.name: Security.txt File
author: bad5ect0r
info.description: The website defines a security policy.

info.name: Header Based Generic OOB Interaction
author: pdteam
info.description: The remote server fetched a spoofed URL from the request headers.

interaction.raw-request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 5617
;; flags: cd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: do; udp: 512
; COOKIE: 75eb4f84cbe9c128

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50ronn85gyw3qpf.oast.pro.	IN	 A
interaction.raw-response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 5617
;; flags: qr aa cd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 2, ADDITIONAL: 2

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50ronn85gyw3qpf.oast.pro.	IN	 A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50ronn85gyw3qpf.oast.pro.	3600	IN	A	178.128.212.209

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50ronn85gyw3qpf.oast.pro.	3600	IN	NS	ns1.oast.pro.
spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50ronn85gyw3qpf.oast.pro.	3600	IN	NS	ns2.oast.pro.

;; ADDITIONAL SECTION:
ns1.oast.pro.	3600	IN	A	178.128.212.209
ns2.oast.pro.	3600	IN	A	178.128.212.209

nuclei.curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'Cache-Control: no-transform' -H 'Cf-Connecting_ip: spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50dmon1arc8e59m.oast.pro' -H 'Client-Ip: spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50i54kyscti6qsn.oast.pro' -H 'Contact: root@ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50rixbfikjdei4r.oast.pro' -H 'Forwarded: for=spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50r3i9d864u5hn3.oast.pro;by=spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50b9ympb4c7xztx.oast.pro;host=spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50gx6oogua9xhrr.oast.pro' -H 'From: root@ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50hxfzwhfb5kmse.oast.pro' -H 'Referer: http://ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50e9mtexrqnrcxy.oast.pro/ref' -H 'True-Client-Ip: spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50xrsiiwhbmnwpq.oast.pro' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' -H 'X-Client-Ip: spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50hnh8hnso7xs4i.oast.pro' -H 'X-Forwarded-For: spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50ronn85gyw3qpf.oast.pro' -H 'X-Forwarded-Host: spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50cgknguezpn7rd.oast.pro' -H 'X-Forwarded-Server: spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50c857gg4iakmfs.oast.pro' -H 'X-HTTP-Host-Override: spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50fnzrdzqqcxrp9.oast.pro' -H 'X-Host: spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50g45c6ksdot7jm.oast.pro' -H 'X-Originating-Ip: spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50femxjf1xhy59m.oast.pro' -H 'X-Real-Ip: spoofed.ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50obzcxg67buwnx.oast.pro' -H 'X-Wap-Profile: http://ccenaftbgtlvrsiq5n50fncxttaf8mjyy.oast.pro/wap.xml' 'https://rappel.conso.gouv.fr'

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: These checks highlight opportunities to [improve the accessibility of your web app](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/accessibility). Only a subset of accessibility issues can be automatically detected so manual testing is also encouraged.
accessibility.manualDescription: These items address areas which an automated testing tool cannot cover. Learn more in our guide on [conducting an accessibility review](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/accessibility/how-to-review).

seo.title: SEO
seo.description: These checks ensure that your page is optimized for search engine results ranking. There are additional factors Lighthouse does not check that may affect your search ranking. [Learn more](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/35769).
seo.manualDescription: Run these additional validators on your site to check additional SEO best practices.

pwa.title: Progressive Web App
pwa.description: These checks validate the aspects of a Progressive Web App. [Learn more](https://developers.google.com/web/progressive-web-apps/checklist).
pwa.manualDescription: These checks are required by the baseline [PWA Checklist](https://developers.google.com/web/progressive-web-apps/checklist) but are not automatically checked by Lighthouse. They do not affect your score but it's important that you verify them manually.
